description:
scons-novice is a re-write of the Software Carpentry https://software-carpentry.org/ "make-novice" source material https://github.com/swcarpentry/make-novice used to create the webpage lesson plan "Automation and Make" http://swcarpentry.github.io/make-novice/ which is licensed as under the Creative Commons Attribution license (CC BY 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.

scons-novice changes the lesson to teach SCons instead of Make.
name: scons-novice
